dc.title: The Office of The Chief Legislative Liaison
dc.description: The Chief, Legislative Liaison (CLL) is directly responsible to the Secretary of the Army for legislative affairs, including formulating, coordinating, supervising, and executing the Armyâs Congressional policy and strategy. The CLL ensures the overall integration of the Armyâs efforts with Congress, develops comprehensive congressional engagement strategies for Army senior leaders, and disseminates critical information on all major Congressional activities.
